com.inrix.sdk

Class CameraManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.inrix.sdk.AreaLimitedManager
      • com.inrix.sdk.CameraManager

  • public class CameraManager
extends AreaLimitedManager
    Manages asynchronous retrieval of traffic cameras.

    Use the following steps to obtain the traffic cameras:

    1. Create a CameraManager.CamerasOnRouteOptions object.
    2. Use it to call the CameraManager.getCamerasOnRoute(com.inrix.sdk.CameraManager.CamerasOnRouteOptions, com.inrix.sdk.CameraManager.IGetCamerasResponseListener) method.
    3. From the listener, obtain a List of Camera object.
    4. From this object, obtain an camera id.
    5. Use the camera id to create a CameraManager.CameraImageOptions object.
    6. Use this object to call the CameraManager.getCameraUrl(com.inrix.sdk.CameraManager.CameraImageOptions) method.
    7. Obtain the image from the received URL.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CameraManager.CameraImageOptions
      Contains options for requesting camera image, such as size and camera id.
      static class  CameraManager.CamerasInBoxOptions
      Contains information used in filtering which traffic cameras are returned when retrieving traffic cameras in a rectangular region.
      static class  CameraManager.CamerasInRadiusOptions
      Contains information used in filtering which traffic cameras are returned when retrieving traffic cameras in a circular region.
      static class  CameraManager.CamerasManagerException
      A exception that is thrown when there is an error with a CameraManager operation.
      static class  CameraManager.CamerasOnRouteOptions
      Contains options for requesting cameras along the route, such as route points and distance in miles for cameras radius.
      static interface  CameraManager.IGetCamerasResponseListener
      The response listener for retrieving cameras collection.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double CAMERA_RADIUS_IN_MILES_DEFAULT
      Indicates default values for radius in miles.
      static int GEO_POINTS_DEFAULT_COMPRESSION_MODE
      Indicates default compression mode for a route points.

        public String getCameraUrl(CameraManager.CameraImageOptions options)
        Retrieves a URL that can be used to obtain a traffic camera bitmap using camera id.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Throws:

        public ICancellable getCamerasOnRoute(CameraManager.CamerasOnRouteOptions options,

        Parameters:

      • getCamerasInBox

        public ICancellable getCamerasInBox(CameraManager.CamerasInBoxOptions options,
                           CameraManager.IGetCamerasResponseListener listener)
        Gets traffic cameras in specified rectangular area.
        Parameters:
        options - Information about the cameras to return.
        listener - The listener that will receive the response.
        Returns:
        An instance of ICancellable so that the action can be cancelled.
        Throws:
        CameraManager.CamerasManagerException - when:
        • options is null or contains invalid values.
        • listener is null.
        • The requested area exceeds the allowed limit.
